DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect nut consumption metabolic parameter biomarkers related inflammation , oxidative stress , endothelial function Korean adult metabolic syndrome .
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , control , parallel , dietary intervention study design . Subjects metabolic syndrome body mass index ≥23 kg/m2 randomize Nut group , supplement 30 g mixed nut include walnut , peanut , pine nut 6 week ; allocate Control group . Metabolic marker evaluate baseline end study .
DOC.criteria: Subjects enrol body mass index ( BMI ) ≥23 kg/m2 meet criterion metabolic syndrome . Subjects exclude nut allergy , peptic disorder , history cancer cardiovascular disease include coronary artery disease , heart valve disease , stroke , establish chronic disease chronic renal insufficiency cirrhosis . Subjects also exclude they:1 ) receive treatment hypoglycemic agent diabetes HbA1c > 7 % ; 2 ) receive corticosteroid treatment ; 3 ) start antihypertensive lipidlowering agent , change dos within previous month ; 4 ) weight change ≥5 % body weight three month prior study ; 5 ) pregnant ; 6 ) regular nut consumer ( > 15g/day nut least three time week ) .
